frontmatter.title: Actions demonstrate values
frontmatter.description: Others can only judge by what is observable. What you put out creates the image that others see.

frontmatter.title: There's no value in complaining about weather
frontmatter.description: We can't control nor change the weather. We can predict. We can prepare. We can respond accordingly.

frontmatter.title: Consider response to others actions
frontmatter.description: It's not possible to control others actions. It is possible to control the response to those actions.

frontmatter.title: Allow time to shape next steps
frontmatter.description: The right path can take time. Don't rush into a decision if the path isn't clear. Strive for better, not perfect. Consider that time changes your own perspective.

frontmatter.title: Take time for joy to inject new energy
frontmatter.description: Finding joy takes work sometimes. That's not a reason not to do it. Use joy + relaxation to inject energy into projects.

frontmatter.title: Build for long term not immediate response
frontmatter.description: Others should not be expected to appreciate the work that went into building, nor the potential. Build with the right structure so it can spread. Don't worry if it's not immediate.

frontmatter.title: Find balance to keep moving
frontmatter.description: Find a balance with physical actions and mental awareness. Keep going to maintain balance.

frontmatter.title: Make joy in present surroundings
frontmatter.description: There's no sense focusing on what is not possible. Accept the situation and make most of new opportunities.

frontmatter.title: Time to act upon virtues
frontmatter.description: How we act now will determine the future. It's not time to return to the past. Act now upon virtues. Do more that will be looked back upon well in the years to come.

frontmatter.title: Accept faults and work towards better
frontmatter.description: There's never a point where you can check a box and be done. Move towards being better. Become more aware of faults in order to improve.
